author: vors
body:
This is copied from TFS 1406196

> There are undoubtedly issues trying to use a class/enum defined in PowerShell from workflow.
> We need to investigate the issues, most likely add errors.

Note: workflows currently exists only in Desktop edition.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: No investments planned for PSWorkflow.  Investments in PSLanguage to remove historical need for Workflow.

title: Workflow + PS defined types
